description:
With a down camber and down-turned, asymmetric toe profile, the Zenist delivers high-performance for the gym, competition climbing, and bouldering. Synthetic uppers provide a consistent fit that's not prone to stretching and a variable thickness rubber gives you seasons of hard use in the gym.

  • Vegan-friendly synthetic Synthratek VX is perforated and slightly elasticity for a close, secure fit
  • Downturned profile with Evolv's Love Bump and Knuckle Box put your toes into a position of power while remaining comfortable
  • VTR rand puts durability and sensitivity where you want it
  • Supportive half-length MX-R midsole
  • Sticky 4.2mm TRAX® SAS rubber grips small foot holds and smears
  • Evolv suggests sizing the same as your street shoe size
name: Evolv Zenist Rock Shoes - Unisex
